Wisdom: لِكُلِّ أَمْرٍ عَاقِبَةٌ حُلْوَةٌ أَوْ مُرَّةٌ
enWisdom: For every matter there is an outcome, [be it] sweet or bitter
Be careful of the outcomes and you will be saved from destruction

Wisdom: مَنْ نَظَرَ فِي الْعَوَاقِبِ سَلِمَ مِنَ النَّوَائِبِ
enWisdom: One who considers the outcomes remains safe from calamities
One who is careful of the outcomes is safe from peril [and destruction]

Wisdom: مَنْ فَكَّرَ فِي الْعَوَاقِبِ أَمِنَ الْمَعَاطِبَ
enWisdom: One who thinks about the consequences is saved from [places of] destruction

Wisdom: مَنْ رَاقَبَ الْعَوَاقِبَ سَلِمَ مِنَ النَّوَائِبِ
enWisdom: One who is careful of the outcomes remains safe from calamities
One who expects [and considers] the outcomes remains safe
One who considers the outcomes remains safe

Wisdom: لَا عَاقِبَةَ أَسْلَمُ مِنْ عَوَاقِبِ السِّلْمِ
enWisdom: There is no outcome sounder than the outcomes of peace
The gauge of [successful] matters is [in] their good endings

Wisdom: مِلَاكُ الْخَوَاتِمِ مَا أَسْفَرَ عَنْ رِضَى اللَّهِ سُبْحَانَهُ
enWisdom: The basis of [the success of] outcomes is that which results in the pleasure of Allah, the Glorified

Wisdom: مَكْرُوهٌ تُحْمَدُ عَاقِبَتُهُ [عَوَاقِبُهُ‏] خَيْرٌ مِنْ مَحْبُوبٍ تُذَمُّ مَغَبَّتُهُ
enWisdom: The disliked act which has a praiseworthy result is better than the action which one loves [but] whose outcome is dispraised

Wisdom: أَحْزَمُ النَّاسِ مَنْ كَانَ الصَّبْرُ وَالنَّظَرُ فِي الْعَوَاقِبِ شِعَارَهُ وَدِثَارَهُ
enWisdom: The most judicious of people is the one whose inner and outer garments are patience and consideration of the consequences [of his actions]

Wisdom: إِذَا هَمَمْتَ بِأَمْرٍ فَاجْتَنِبْ ذَمِيمَ الْعَوَاقِبِ فِيهِ
enWisdom: When you endeavour to act upon a matter, then eschew the blameworthy outcomes in it
In the outcomes [of matters] there is [either] a curer or a comforter

Wisdom: أَوَاخِرُ مَصَادِرِ التَّوَقِّي أَوَائِلُ مَوَارِدِ الْحَذَرِ
enWisdom: The last sources of self-preservation are the first points of caution
